summary: A patch for Paradise Halls that provides bug-fixing, feature improvements and compatibility with other mods.
descriptionHtml:
This is a script patch for Paradise Halls v0.7.3. With kind permission from Paradise Halls original creator, Layam. Most of the patch is by RiiakShiNal, some other edits by GAntono.

1. Fixes a bug where, after selling a slave, the player could not capture new ones. This fix only prevents the bug from happening, it cannot fix already bugged slaves. For slaves already bugged you have 3 choices:
- Load a saved game from before you enslaved the bugged slave.
- Kill the bugged slave(s) and you should be able to enslave again.
- Uncheck the mod, load your save, save again, quit, re-check the mod, load the new save (the mod should "reset", but you will lose all existing slaves).
(RiiakShiNal)

2. An update to the Slave Value Analysis Script, so that training has an effect on slave sale price.
(RiiakShiNal)

3. Devious Devices compatibility.
(RiiakShiNa)

4. Zaz Animation Pack compatibility.
(GAntono)


Installation:

- Use a mod manager (always the best method), or:

Unpack the 7z file, copy the contents of the Data folder to your game's Skyrim folder and choose Merge/Replace when asked.
author: RiiakShiNal and GAntono
